person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Australia , who hold a 2-0 lead in the five-match test series , overhauled West Indies ' total of 172 all out with eight balls to spare to end a run of six successive one-day defeats .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Australia |
| West Indies |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions two entities that are clearly people or groups of people: "Australia" and "West Indies". These entities are identified as the teams in the cricket match described in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Australia |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions only one clear "Person" entity: "Australia". "West Indies" is also a person or group of people, but it is mentioned as the opponent of Australia, so it is already included in the "Australia" entity as the team Australia is playing against. Therefore, there is no need to include "West Indies" as a separate entity in the table.
